heading: HR01781
0: RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO PROTECT AND PRESERVE NATIONAL INTEREST THROUGH THE REJECTION OF FOREIGN LOAN CONTRACTS WHICH CONTAIN PROVISIONS THAT REQUIRE THE PHILIPPINES TO PUT UP AS COLLATERAL THE COUNTRY'S NATURAL RESOURCES

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01781
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO PROTECT AND PRESERVE NATIONAL INTEREST THROUGH THE REJECTION OF FOREIGN LOAN CONTRACTS WHICH CONTAIN PROVISIONS THAT REQUIRE THE PHILIPPINES TO PUT UP AS COLLATERAL THE COUNTRY'S NATURAL RESOURCES
